column5: the owner of the “Miami” club and six other staff members were sent to the court over charges of large use and distribution of narcotic drugs.------According to Bun Satya
column6: the owner of the “Miami” club named Sreng Vireak and six other staff
column8: have been sent to the court for legal action.------More than ------10 kilograms of drugs------ have been confiscated by the police during a nighttime raid------https://cne.wtf/2019/04/11/miami-club-raided-over-40-arrests/------ at the “Miami” club.------After conducting urination tests on more than 50 youths detained in the raid
column9: police found 32 young people had used drugs.------The drug-free clubbers were released without charge and the drug users are to be sent to drug detention centers.------The “Miami” club is on Street 360
column12: and has been closed down three times before. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/299772
